IShader

Defines the public interface for using CShader

Header

{Link:#include "Rendering/Caustic/IShader.h"{Rendering/Caustic/IShader.h}}

Functions
Clone
virtual CRefObj<IShader> Clone(
ID3D11Device* pDevice
) = 0

Clones the shader. This is useful when you want to reuse a shader (such as those returned by IShaderMgr::FindShader) but want the shader to have its own set of parameters.

Parameters
pDevice
ID3D11Device*

device

Returns

Copy of shader

Name
virtual std::wstring &Name() = 0
Returns

Name of shader

BeginRender
virtual void BeginRender(
IRenderer *pRenderer,
IRenderMaterial *pMaterial,
std::vector<CRefObj<ILight>> &lights,
DirectX::XMMATRIX *pWorld
) = 0

Starts rendering.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

graphics device

pFrontMaterial

material to use for front faces

pBackMaterial

material to use for back faces

lights
std::vector<CRefObj<ILight>>&

list of lights to use

pWorld
DirectX::XMMATRIX*

matrix to apply

EndRender
virtual void EndRender(
IRenderer* pRenderer
) = 0

Ends rendering. Called after the rendering using the shader has completed.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

graphics device

GetShaderInfo
virtual CRefObj<IShaderInfo> GetShaderInfo() = 0
Returns

Returns the shader info associated with the shader

Dispatch
virtual void Dispatch(
IRenderer* pRenderer,
int xThreads,
int yThreads,
int zThreads
) = 0

This runs the compute shader, if any.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

graphics device

xThreads
int

Number of threads in X axis

yThreads
int

Number of threads in Y axis

zThreads
int

Number of threads in Z axis
